icmTeam: Microsoft Sentinel Data Connectors/Ingestion Pipeline (Raw data only, not alerts)

tables.name: CrowdStrikeVulnerabilities
tables.description: The CrowdStrikeVulnerabilities table contains logs from the CrowdStrike Vulnerabilities API that have been ingested into Microsoft Sentinel.

columns.name: TimeGenerated
columns.description: The timestamp (UTC) when the event was ingested.

columns.name: Id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the vulnerability record.

columns.name: Cid
columns.description: Customer ID in the CrowdStrike platform.

columns.name: Aid
columns.description: Agent ID of the system where vulnerability was detected.

columns.name: VulnerabilityId
columns.description: Unique identifier for the specific vulnerability.

columns.name: DataProviders
columns.description: List of data providers that reported this vulnerability.

columns.name: CreatedTimestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the vulnerability was first detected.

columns.name: UpdatedTimestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the vulnerability record was last updated.

columns.name: Status
columns.description: Current status of the vulnerability.

columns.name: Apps
columns.description: List of affected applications.

columns.name: SuppressionInfo
columns.description: Information about vulnerability suppression if applied.

columns.name: Confidence
columns.description: Confidence level of the vulnerability detection.

columns.name: App
columns.description: Detailed information about the affected application.

columns.name: Cve
columns.description: Common Vulnerabilities and Exposures (CVE) information.

columns.name: HostInfo
columns.description: Information about the affected host system.

columns.name: Remediation
columns.description: Remediation steps or recommendations for the vulnerability.

tables.name: CrowdStrikeAlerts
tables.description: The CrowdStrikeAlerts table contains logs from the CrowdStrike Alerts API that have been ingested into Microsoft Sentinel.

columns.name: TimeGenerated
columns.description: The timestamp (UTC) when the alert was generated.

columns.name: AgentId
columns.description: Unique identifier for the CrowdStrike agent that generated the alert.

columns.name: AggregateId
columns.description: Identifier for aggregated alerts from the same source.

columns.name: AssignedToName
columns.description: Name of the user assigned to handle the alert.

columns.name: AssignedToUid
columns.description: User ID of the assigned user.

columns.name: AssignedToUuid
columns.description: UUID of the assigned user.

columns.name: Cid
columns.description: Customer ID in the CrowdStrike platform.

columns.name: CompositeId
columns.description: Composite identifier combining multiple alert attributes.

columns.name: Confidence
columns.description: Confidence score of the alert (0-100).

columns.name: CrawledTimestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the alert data was last crawled.

columns.name: CreatedTimestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the alert was first created.

columns.name: DataDomains
columns.description: Domains associated with the alert.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Detailed description of the alert.

columns.name: DisplayName
columns.description: Human-readable name for the alert.

columns.name: EmailSent
columns.description: Indicates if an email notification was sent for this alert.

columns.name: External
columns.description: Indicates if the alert originated from an external source.

columns.name: Id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the alert.

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Name of the alert.

columns.name: Objective
columns.description: The attacker's presumed objective.

columns.name: PatternId
columns.description: Identifier for the detection pattern that triggered the alert.

columns.name: Platform
columns.description: Operating system or platform where the alert was detected.

columns.name: Product
columns.description: CrowdStrike product that generated the alert.

columns.name: Scenario
columns.description: Security scenario that triggered the alert.

columns.name: SecondsToResolved
columns.description: Time in seconds from alert creation to resolution.

columns.name: SecondsToTriaged
columns.description: Time in seconds from alert creation to triage.

columns.name: Severity
columns.description: Severity level of the alert.

columns.name: SeverityName
columns.description: Text representation of the severity level.

columns.name: ShowInUi
columns.description: Indicates if the alert should be displayed in the user interface.

columns.name: SourceProducts
columns.description: List of products that contributed to this alert.

columns.name: SourceVendors
columns.description: List of vendors associated with the alert sources.

columns.name: Status
columns.description: Current status of the alert.

columns.name: Tactic
columns.description: MITRE ATT&CK tactic associated with the alert.

columns.name: TacticId
columns.description: Identifier of the MITRE ATT&CK tactic.

columns.name: Tags
columns.description: Custom tags associated with the alert.

columns.name: Technique
columns.description: MITRE ATT&CK technique associated with the alert.

columns.name: TechniqueId
columns.description: Identifier of the MITRE ATT&CK technique.

columns.name: Timestamp
columns.description: Time when the alert event occurred.

columns.name: AlertType
columns.description: The type or category of the CrowdStrike alert.

columns.name: UpdatedTimestamp
columns.description: Time when the alert was last updated.

tables.name: CrowdStrikeIncidents
tables.description: The CrowdStrikeIncidents table contains logs from the CrowdStrike Incidents API that have been ingested into Microsoft Sentinel.

columns.name: TimeGenerated
columns.description: The timestamp (UTC) when the incident data was ingested.

columns.name: AssignedTo
columns.description: ID of the user assigned to the incident.

columns.name: AssignedToName
columns.description: Name of the user assigned to handle the incident.

columns.name: Cid
columns.description: Customer ID in the CrowdStrike platform.

columns.name: Created
columns.description: Timestamp when the incident was created.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Detailed description of the incident.

columns.name: EmailState
columns.description: Current state of email notifications for the incident.

columns.name: End
columns.description: Timestamp when the incident was closed or resolved.

columns.name: EventsHistogram
columns.description: Timeline of events associated with the incident.

columns.name: FineScore
columns.description: Severity score assigned to the incident.

columns.name: GroupingIds
columns.description: List of IDs used to group related incidents.

columns.name: HostIds
columns.description: List of host IDs involved in the incident.

columns.name: Hosts
columns.description: Detailed information about affected hosts.

columns.name: IncidentId
columns.description: Unique identifier for the incident.

columns.name: IncidentType
columns.description: Numerical identifier for the type of incident.

columns.name: LmHostIds
columns.description: List of host IDs associated with Lightweight Mode.

columns.name: LmHostsCapped
columns.description: Indicates if the number of Lightweight Mode hosts was capped.

columns.name: LmTypes
columns.description: Types of Lightweight Mode configurations.

columns.name: LmraHostIds
columns.description: List of host IDs associated with LMRA (Lightweight Mode Remote Access).

columns.name: LmraHostsCapped
columns.description: Indicates if the number of LMRA hosts was capped.

columns.name: ModifiedTimestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the incident was last modified.

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Name or title of the incident.

columns.name: Objectives
columns.description: List of attacker objectives identified in the incident.

columns.name: Start
columns.description: Timestamp when the incident started.

columns.name: State
columns.description: Current state of the incident.

columns.name: Status
columns.description: Numerical status code of the incident.

columns.name: Tactics
columns.description: List of MITRE ATT&CK tactics identified in the incident.

columns.name: Tags
columns.description: Custom tags associated with the incident.

columns.name: Techniques
columns.description: List of MITRE ATT&CK techniques identified in the incident.

columns.name: Users
columns.description: List of users involved in or affected by the incident.

tables.name: CrowdStrikeDetections
tables.description: The CrowdStrikeDetections table contains logs from the CrowdStrike Detections API that have been ingested into Microsoft Sentinel.

columns.name: TimeGenerated
columns.description: The timestamp (UTC) when the detection event was ingested.

columns.name: AdversaryIds
columns.description: List of identified adversary IDs associated with the detection.

columns.name: AssignedToName
columns.description: Name of the user assigned to handle the detection.

columns.name: AssignedToUid
columns.description: User ID of the assigned user.

columns.name: Behaviors
columns.description: List of suspicious behaviors identified in the detection.

columns.name: BehaviorsProcessed
columns.description: List of processed and analyzed behaviors from the detection.

columns.name: Cid
columns.description: Customer ID in the CrowdStrike platform.

columns.name: CreatedTimestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the detection was first created.

columns.name: DateUpdated
columns.description: Date when the detection was last updated.

columns.name: DetectionId
columns.description: Unique identifier for the detection.

columns.name: Device
columns.description: Information about the device where the detection occurred.

columns.name: EmailSent
columns.description: Indicates if an email notification was sent for this detection.

columns.name: FirstBehaviorTime
columns.description: Timestamp of the first suspicious behavior detected.

columns.name: HostInfo
columns.description: Detailed information about the host system where the detection occurred.

columns.name: LastBehavior
columns.description: Timestamp of the most recent suspicious behavior detected.

columns.name: MaxConfidence
columns.description: Highest confidence score assigned to any behavior in the detection.

columns.name: MaxSeverity
columns.description: Highest severity level assigned to any behavior in the detection.

columns.name: MaxSeverityDisplayName
columns.description: Text representation of the highest severity level.

columns.name: OverwatchNotes
columns.description: Notes added by CrowdStrike Overwatch team regarding the detection.

columns.name: QuarantinedFiles
columns.description: List of files that were quarantined as part of the detection.

columns.name: SecondsToResolved
columns.description: Time in seconds from detection creation to resolution.

columns.name: SecondsToTriaged
columns.description: Time in seconds from detection creation to triage.

columns.name: ShowInUi
columns.description: Indicates if the detection should be displayed in the user interface.

columns.name: Status
columns.description: Current status of the detection.

tables.name: CrowdStrikeHosts
tables.description: The CrowdStrikeHosts table contains logs from the CrowdStrike Hosts API that have been ingested into Microsoft Sentinel.

columns.name: TimeGenerated
columns.description: The timestamp (UTC) when the host data was ingested.

columns.name: AgentLoadFlags
columns.description: Flags indicating the load status of the CrowdStrike agent.

columns.name: AgentLocalTime
columns.description: Local time of the system where the agent is installed.

columns.name: AgentVersion
columns.description: Version of the installed CrowdStrike agent.

columns.name: BaseImageVersion
columns.description: Version of the base operating system image.

columns.name: BiosManufacturer
columns.description: Manufacturer of the system BIOS.

columns.name: BiosVersion
columns.description: Version of the system BIOS.

columns.name: BuildNumber
columns.description: Operating system build number.

columns.name: ChassisType
columns.description: Type of system chassis (numerical identifier).

columns.name: ChassisTypeDesc
columns.description: Description of the system chassis type.

columns.name: Cid
columns.description: Cid the CrowdStrike platform.

columns.name: ConfigIdBase
columns.description: Base configuration ID for the CrowdStrike agent.

columns.name: ConfigIdBuild
columns.description: Build configuration ID for the CrowdStrike agent.

columns.name: ConfigIdPlatform
columns.description: Platform-specific configuration ID for the CrowdStrike agent.

columns.name: ConnectionIp
columns.description: IP address used by the host to connect to CrowdStrike cloud.

columns.name: ConnectionMacAddress
columns.description: MAC address of the network interface used for CrowdStrike connection.

columns.name: CpuSignature
columns.description: Unique identifier for the CPU architecture and features.

columns.name: CpuVendor
columns.description: Manufacturer of the CPU.

columns.name: DefaultGatewayIp
columns.description: IP address of the default network gateway.

columns.name: DeploymentType
columns.description: Type of CrowdStrike agent deployment on the host.

columns.name: DetectionSuppressionStatus
columns.description: Status of detection suppression rules applied to the host.

columns.name: DeviceId
columns.description: Unique identifier for the device in CrowdStrike platform.

columns.name: DevicePolicies
columns.description: List of security policies applied to the device.

columns.name: Email
columns.description: Email address associated with the host or primary user.

columns.name: ExternalIp
columns.description: External IP address of the host.

columns.name: FilesystemContainmentStatus
columns.description: Status of filesystem containment feature for the host.

columns.name: FirstLoginTimestamp
columns.description: Timestamp of the first user login on the host.

columns.name: FirstSeen
columns.description: Timestamp when the host was first seen by CrowdStrike.

columns.name: GroupHash
columns.description: Hash identifier for the host's group membership.

columns.name: Groups
columns.description: List of security groups the host belongs to.

columns.name: HostHiddenStatus
columns.description: Indicates if the host is hidden from normal visibility.

columns.name: HostUtcOffset
columns.description: UTC time offset for the host's timezone.

columns.name: Hostname
columns.description: Network hostname of the system.

columns.name: InstanceId
columns.description: Cloud instance identifier (if applicable).

columns.name: InternetExposure
columns.description: Level of internet exposure for the host.

columns.name: K8sClusterGitVersion
columns.description: Git version of the Kubernetes cluster deployment.

columns.name: K8sClusterId
columns.description: Unique identifier for the Kubernetes cluster.

columns.name: K8sClusterVersion
columns.description: Version of the Kubernetes cluster.

columns.name: KernelVersion
columns.description: Version of the operating system kernel.

columns.name: LastLoginTimestamp
columns.description: Timestamp of the most recent user login.

columns.name: LastLoginUid
columns.description: User ID of the last user to log in.

columns.name: LastLoginUser
columns.description: Username of the last user to log in.

columns.name: LastLoginUserSid
columns.description: Security identifier (SID) of the last user to log in.

columns.name: LastReboot
columns.description: Timestamp of the last system reboot.

columns.name: LastSeen
columns.description: Timestamp when the host was last seen active by CrowdStrike.

columns.name: LinuxSensorMode
columns.description: Operating mode of the CrowdStrike sensor on Linux systems.

columns.name: LocalIp
columns.description: Local/Internal IP address of the host.

columns.name: MacAddress
columns.description: Primary MAC address of the host.

columns.name: MachineDomain
columns.description: Domain name the machine is joined to.

columns.name: MajorVersion
columns.description: Major version number of the operating system.

columns.name: ManagedApps
columns.description: List of applications managed by CrowdStrike on the host.

columns.name: Meta
columns.description: Additional metadata about the host.

columns.name: MigrationCompletedTime
columns.description: Timestamp when agent migration was completed.

columns.name: MinorVersion
columns.description: Minor version number of the operating system.

columns.name: ModifiedTimestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the host record was last modified.

columns.name: Notes
columns.description: Custom notes or annotations about the host.

columns.name: OsBuild
columns.description: Build number of the operating system.

columns.name: OsProductName
columns.description: Product name of the operating system.

columns.name: OsVersion
columns.description: Version string of the operating system.

columns.name: Ou
columns.description: Organizational Unit information for the host.

columns.name: PlatformId
columns.description: Unique identifier for the platform type.

columns.name: PlatformName
columns.description: Name of the platform.

columns.name: PodAnnotations
columns.description: Kubernetes pod annotations associated with the host.

columns.name: PodHostIp4
columns.description: IPv4 address of the Kubernetes pod host.

columns.name: PodHostIp6
columns.description: IPv6 address of the Kubernetes pod host.

columns.name: PodHostname
columns.description: Hostname of the Kubernetes pod.

columns.name: PodId
columns.description: Unique identifier for the Kubernetes pod.

columns.name: PodIp4
columns.description: IPv4 address assigned to the Kubernetes pod.

columns.name: PodIp6
columns.description: IPv6 address assigned to the Kubernetes pod.

columns.name: PodLabels
columns.description: Labels assigned to the Kubernetes pod.

columns.name: PodName
columns.description: Name of the Kubernetes pod.

columns.name: PodNamespace
columns.description: Kubernetes namespace where the pod is deployed.

columns.name: PodServiceAccountName
columns.description: Name of the Kubernetes service account used by the pod.

columns.name: PointerSize
columns.description: Memory pointer size of the system architecture (32/64 bit).

columns.name: Policies
columns.description: List of all security policies applied to the host.

columns.name: ProductType
columns.description: Type of product or system (numerical identifier).

columns.name: ProductTypeDesc
columns.description: Description of the product or system type.

columns.name: ProvisionStatus
columns.description: Current provisioning status of the host.

columns.name: ReducedFunctionalityMode
columns.description: Indicates if the host is running in reduced functionality mode.

columns.name: ReleaseGroup
columns.description: Group identifier for software release management.

columns.name: RtrState
columns.description: State of Real Time Response functionality.

columns.name: SerialNumber
columns.description: System serial number from BIOS/hardware.

columns.name: ServicePackMajor
columns.description: Major version of installed service pack.

columns.name: ServicePackMinor
columns.description: Minor version of installed service pack.

columns.name: ServiceProvider
columns.description: Cloud service provider hosting the system.

columns.name: ServiceProviderAccountId
columns.description: Account identifier from the cloud service provider.

columns.name: SiteName
columns.description: Name of the site where the host is located.

columns.name: Status
columns.description: Current operational status of the host.

columns.name: SystemManufacturer
columns.description: Manufacturer of the system hardware.

columns.name: SystemProductName
columns.description: Product name or model of the system.

columns.name: Tags
columns.description: Custom tags assigned to the host.
